title: Updated 3 Bed/ 2 Bath; In-Unit Laundry; Garage Parking!

', 'Nine Exceptional Units, spacious three bedroom/two full bath w/unique floorplans, elevator access, loft-like 10+ foot ceilings, brick masonry construction, outdoor space, views', 'and garage parking', 'Completed Summer 2007', 'Amenities and Finishes include the following:', 'custom cherry cabinetry by Canac (a Kohler brand company)', 'gourmet kitchen w/granite and island', 'upgraded stainless steel appliance package', 'woodburning fireplace', 'brazilian cherry hardwood floors', 'master baths include marble,', 'double vanities, shower panel w/5 body', 'sprays & jetted tub', 'master bedroom walk-in closet', 'grohe & kohler fixtures', 'in-unit full laundry', 'casement windows w/low-e', 'deeded garage parking (monthly fee may apply)', '
